metadata.name: File Recovery From Backup Via Wbadmin.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the recovery of files from backups via "wbadmin.exe". Attackers can restore sensitive files such as NTDS.DIT or Registry Hives from backups in order to potentially extract credentials.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wbadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wbadmin.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' recovery')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('recoverytarget')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('itemtype:file')))

output.summary: Detects the recovery of files from backups via "wbadmin.exe". Attackers can restore sensitive files such as NTDS.DIT or Registry Hives from backups in order to potentially extract credentials.
